message.body: Hey, I'm having the hardest time remembering the name of that Indian restaurant near Washington Avenue with the butter chicken. Do you remember what it is?
I knew it! I just wasn't sure! Wouldn't it be easier just to call the place "Butter Chicken"?
It's so delicious that they should. Maybe even Butt Chicken. That's what mike and I got on one of our containers. Butt chicken.
Hahahah! That's too funny. You know what, this is all your fault, you're the one who put that dish in my head and now every time I pass by the place, I think butter chicken.
It sounds good. How are classes?
Annoying. I don't understand half of it and there's just too much info and not enough time to do anything. It'll be alright though.
Yup, that sounds like college hahah. I'm sure it will be, you can do it!
